Submodules

eisenradio.app module

eisenradio.cmd module

cmd module, imports ghetto_recorder and calls ghetto_recorder.terminal_main() Module call:

Python3 -m eisenradio.cmd

Command line menu:

use menu option: 4 – Set path to config, settings.ini

eisenradio.db module

eisenradio.db.convert_ascii(file_name)
eisenradio.db.empty_db_from_schema()
eisenradio.db.make_db_from_schema(db_path)
eisenradio.db.render_picture(byte_data, de_enc)

eisenradio.wsgi module

eisenradio.wsgi.wsgi_app(a_port)

PROD import this def, make multiple instances of flask app on various ports tell flask app the port num, so all functions are happy

Module contents

eisenradio.create_app(work_port)

flask prod application factory prod

eisenradio.create_app_dev(work_port, test=None)

dev

dev

eisenradio.script_path = 'C:\\Users\\rene_\\PycharmProjects\\eisenradio_dev\\eisenradio'

Flask application factory with blueprints
